panels.brickConf: {"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-table","properties":{"height":300,"rowKey":"time","page":"${query.page=1|number}","pageSize":"${query.pageSize=4|number}","columns":[{"title":"time","dataIndex":"time","key":"time"},{"title":"连接名","dataIndex":"connect_name","key":"connect_name"},{"title":"会话地址","dataIndex":"connect_saddr","key":"connect_saddr"},{"title":"创建时间","dataIndex":"connect_create_time","key":"connect_create_time"},{"title":"连接状态","dataIndex":"connect_status","key":"connect_status"},{"title":"IP 地址","dataIndex":"connect_ip_addr","key":"connect_ip_addr"}]},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","dims":["time(1m)","connect_name"],"measures":[{"name":"connect_saddr","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_saddr"]}},{"name":"connect_create_time","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_create_time"]}},{"name":"connect_status","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_status"]}},{"name":"connect_ip_addr","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_ip_addr"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"connect_name","operator":"!=","value":"null"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limitBy":{"expressions":["connect_name"],"limit":1}}],"transform":{"dataSource":"<% { ...DATA, list: DATA.list.map(row => ({ ...row,  time: moment(row.time * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'),  connect_create_time: moment(row.time * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') }) )} %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 连接详情

{"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-table","properties":{"height":300,"rowKey":"time","page":"${query.page=1|number}","pageSize":"${query.pageSize=5|number}","columns":[{"title":"time","dataIndex":"time","key":"time"},{"title":"表空间名称","dataIndex":"table_space_name","key":"table_space_name"},{"title":"表空间类型","dataIndex":"table_space_type","key":"table_space_type"},{"title":"状态","dataIndex":"table_space_status","key":"table_space_status"},{"title":"最大大小","dataIndex":"table_space_max_size","key":"table_space_max_size"},{"title":"IP 包含的文件数","dataIndex":"table_space_file_num","key":"table_space_file_num"},{"title":"总大小","dataIndex":"table_space_total_size","key":"table_space_total_size"}]},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","dims":["time(1m)","table_space_name"],"measures":[{"name":"table_space_type","function":{"expression":"last","args":["table_space_type"]}},{"name":"table_space_status","function":{"expression":"last","args":["table_space_status"]}},{"name":"table_space_max_size","function":{"expression":"last","args":["table_space_max_size"]}},{"name":"table_space_file_num","function":{"expression":"last","args":["table_space_file_num"]}},{"name":"table_space_total_size","function":{"expression":"last","args":["table_space_total_size"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"table_space_name","operator":"!=","value":"null"},{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limitBy":{"expressions":["table_space_name"],"limit":1}}],"transform":{"dataSource":"<% { ...DATA, list: DATA.list.map(row => ({ ...row,  time: moment(row.time * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'),  table_space_max_size: PIPES.unitFormat(row.table_space_max_size, \"bytes\"),  table_space_total_size: PIPES.unitFormat(row.table_space_total_size, \"bytes\") }) )} %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 表空间使用

{"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-table","properties":{"height":300,"rowKey":"time","page":"${query.page=1|number}","pageSize":"${query.pageSize=5|number}","columns":[{"title":"time","dataIndex":"time","key":"time"},{"title":"数据文件名称","dataIndex":"data_file_name","key":"data_file_name"},{"title":"数据文件所属表空间名","dataIndex":"tablespace_name","key":"tablespace_name"},{"title":"数据文件大小","dataIndex":"data_file_size","key":"data_file_size"},{"title":"数据文件块大小","dataIndex":"data_file_block_size","key":"data_file_block_size"},{"title":"数据文件状态","dataIndex":"data_file_status","key":"data_file_status"},{"title":"是否可自动扩展","dataIndex":"is_auto_extensible","key":"is_auto_extensible"},{"title":"文件在线状态","dataIndex":"data_file_online_status","key":"data_file_online_status"}]},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","dims":["time(1m)","data_file_name"],"measures":[{"name":"tablespace_name","function":{"expression":"last","args":["tablespace_name"]}},{"name":"data_file_size","function":{"expression":"last","args":["data_file_size"]}},{"name":"data_file_block_size","function":{"expression":"last","args":["data_file_block_size"]}},{"name":"data_file_status","function":{"expression":"last","args":["data_file_status"]}},{"name":"is_auto_extensible","function":{"expression":"last","args":["is_auto_extensible"]}},{"name":"data_file_online_status","function":{"expression":"last","args":["data_file_online_status"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"},{"name":"data_file_name","operator":"!=","value":"null"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limitBy":{"expressions":["data_file_name"],"limit":1}}],"transform":{"dataSource":"<% { ...DATA, list: DATA.list.map(row => ({ ...row,  time: moment(row.time * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'),  data_file_size: PIPES.unitFormat(row.data_file_size, \"bytes\")} ))} %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
